file_content.text: You know your way around a fight, Teeseven.
The arena fights are brutal. I'd shut them down if I could.
Not far from where I ended a mugging ring one time. Good memories.
Smell of this place. It's worse every time. Just keeps decomposing.
Imagine if they put all this energy into a real cause.
Zealots. Great to have around if they're on your side.
I've been here before, to the Razor. Nothing good lives here.
A long time ago, the Razor was the place to be. And now... I'd rather be back in the swamp.
You'll get no mercy from me!
You must pay for your crimes!
For Tanek!
Disarm immediately!
In the name of Arcann, surrender!
Cease your hostilities at once!
Don't know how anyone could live like this. Zakuul is supposed to be better.
T7 = been through a lot
I don't doubt it. We'll trade stories sometime.
Senya = in for a treat!
T7 + Jedi = been through a lot
Not getting access to the hangar controls. Some kind of power outage.
Odd fluctuations. Relays are gunked up or something. May have to clean out the junctions.
Everything's good to go. What was it?
Next time, you're on clean-up detail.
An infestation--if they'd grown any bigger, we'd have more to worry about than spotty power. We should check the rest of the ship.
Courtesy: I will take it upon myself to eradicate these hostile stowaways, masters. Once I have gathered additional munitions, I will scour the ship from top to bottom!
Whoa, whoa, whoa, easy! We can't have you blasting through the hull left and right!
Appeasement: I can employ knives and blunt-force instruments instead--would that make you feel safer?
Not... really?
Update: Extermination efforts aboard the Gravestone have been slower than anticipated, master.
Update: I have determined that the industrial-strength cleansers that Master Vortena insisted upon using are, in fact, highly lethal when applied to the infesting creatures directly.
Update: My sensors cannot detect any further traces of the infestation aboard the Gravestone, master.
It seems quite unnecessary that I clean up the creatures' remains--they clearly serve as an effective warning to other potential stowaways.
But, Master Vortena was quite insistent, so the ship will be quite clean upon your return.
This revelation should accelerate my completion of the task considerably, master.
Recommendation: You may wish to acquire thirty to forty gallons of industrial cleanser while you're in the Spire. Our stocks have been somewhat depleted.
T7 = slicing // You = cover T7?
Mission = important // T7 = appreciates backup!
Zakuulan computers = snobby // Zakuulan people = same?
Understanding data flows = understanding system weak points // System weak points + you + friends = mission opportunities!
You don't belong here, Outlander!
You're unworthy of the dragon's fire!
Zildrog knows no mercy!
Feel the power of Zildrog's claws!
Prove your worth!
Your spirit is... strong.
Your suffering fuels Zildrog's return!
In the dragon's name!
In the end... we are all consumed.
The dragon is eternal!
Give it up, Outlander!
You've achieved... nothing.
